attributes.action: equal rights regarding tv license for the deaf as for the blind
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: currently deaf people do not get any help towards the cost of a british tv license, unlike the blind who currently get a 50% reduction. every programme does not have bsl (british sign language) and not everyone can understand lip reading. included in the price of the tv License is also cost of radio, which deaf people can not hear.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "equal rights regarding tv license for the deaf as for the blind."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15751.asp
